title: A Separate Country
description: A Separate Country by Robert Hicks, Grand Central Publishing, 2009, First Edition, First printing, NEW/NEW. This is a NEW Hardcover Novel. A stranger in a strange, beautiful, and confounding town, General Hood is ready to find happiness and comfort after losing a war and becoming one of the most controversial generals of the Confederate Army. An Awesome Historical Accounting of the period!
author: Robert Hicks
